mapper.select: SELECT t.job_id AS jobId, t.`TITLE`, t.`SALARY`, t.`WORK_ADDRESS` AS workAddress, t.`JOB_NATURE` AS jobNature, t.`WORK_YEAR` AS workYear, t.`EDUCATION` FROM basis_tb_job t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.job_id = #{jobId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basis_tb_job ( USER_ID, JOB_CID, TITLE, SALARY, WORK_ADDRESS, JOB_NATURE, WORK_YEAR, EDUCATION, STATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{jobCId}, #{title}, #{salary}, #{workAddress}, #{jobNature}, #{workYear}, #{education}, 'U', NOW(), #{modifyUser}, NOW(), #{modifyUser} )
